channel.title: Learning on S.P.A.M.
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on S.P.A.M.

item.title: Trying out Flutter
item.description: Flutter, Google’s Dart based SDK for building native mobile applications, has been around for a while and I finally decided to take it for a spin. I’ve attempted at mobile app development before in Android but never got past Android Studio’s terrible slowness. Maybe it’s because my computer is kinda old. But that doesn’t change how bad the experience was. Also, I just couldn’t get Java through my head. It was more than a bit overwhelming to try and learn.
